Class LinkedNeuron

  • java.lang.Object
    • keel.Algorithms.Neural_Networks.NNEP_Common.neuralnet.LinkedNeuron
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    INeuron
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ExpNeuron, LinearNeuron, SigmNeuron

    public abstract class LinkedNeuron
extends java.lang.Object
implements INeuron

    Since:
    JDK1.5

    Version:
    0.1
    Author:
    Written by Pedro Antonio Gutierrez Penya, Aaron Ruiz Mora (University of Cordoba) 17/07/2007

      • operate

        public double operate(double[] inputs)

        Operates this neuron, using an input array. This means:

        1) apply the input function to all the inputs neuron and sum the result

        2) apply the output function to the result

        Specified by:
        operate in interface INeuron
        Parameters:
        inputs - Double array to be used for the inputs observations
        Returns:
        double Output of the neuron for the array specified

      • operate

        public double[] operate(double[][] inputs)

        Operates this neuron using an input matrix as argument

        Specified by:
        operate in interface INeuron
        Parameters:
        inputs - Double matrix to be used for the inputs observations
        Returns:
        double [] Array outputs of the neuron for the matrix specified

      • inputFunction

        protected abstract double inputFunction(double input,
                                        double in,
                                        double weight)

        Input function of the neuron. Update input for each input neuron

        Parameters:
        input - Old input
        in - Output of the input neuron
        weight - Weight of the link to the input neuron
        Returns:
        double Partial input of the input neuron
